upgrades.changelog:
- Note - May cause problems with some aux configurations. Recommend not installing if you are using an aux switch.
- Fixed - The inoperative issue after changing parameter 8 from high value to low value.

- Modified Smart Bulb Mode so that the output can only be turned off by sending a Basic Set (0x00).
- Fixed: Solve the problem that the power measured by the light is 5W when the load is not connected (caused by inaccurate power measurement at extremely low power consumption).
- Feature: Added config button scenes and basic scenes. This version only (Not enough storage space going further).
